snippet.title: Death Of A Wish | Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Death of a Wish is descending March 11, 2024.

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2302080/Death_of_a_Wish/

Death of a Wish is a vicious action-RPG set in a nightmare filled with horrifying monsters and terrifying people.

Play as Christian as he unites with others to challenge the cult that raised him. By taking down the four Sanctum Faiths: Father, Sister, Cardinal, and Priest, they will upend the order of the world.

Trailer edited by @CodexEntry.

#indiegame #actiongame #characteraction #soulslike
